subject: Re: [junit] JUnit version compatibility issues
msgSnippet: So said Vladimir R. Bossicard on 3/11/2003 -------------------- ... You don t need to refactor your code but simply do a query-replace: ... an emacs user, I
messageBody:
So said Vladimir R. Bossicard on 3/11/2003 --------------------
> Our question is, what is the newest version of JUnit we could upgrade to,
> without running into this issue?

You don't need to refactor your code but simply do a query-replace:
... an emacs user, I presume.
